data.title: Ethereum: How soon exactly will be too soon for ETH's $4K target
data.text: $4k is an essential level for Ethereum. Not only has it been a critical resistance and support, but it is also a crucial psychological level, and Ethereum has not seen its sights once since the beginning of this year.
